snippet: The recall affects the 2006-7 Chevrolet Malibu and Malibu Maxx and the 2006-7 Pontiac G6, a total of more than 81,000 vehicles in North America.
abstract: General Motors announces recall of more than 81,000 cars because of potential failure of vehicles' electronic power steering systems.
lead_paragraph: The recall affects the 2006-7 Chevrolet Malibu and Malibu Maxx and the 2006-7 Pontiac G6, a total of more than 81,000 vehicles in North America.

headline.main: G.M. Expands 2014 Recall for Power Steering Failure
